title: Best of The Herd: 01/29/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/29/2019
description:
Colin wonders if Anthony Davis joining LeBron would really have the impact on the NBA that people think it would.  He thinks people not giving credit to Jared Goff clearly didn't watch Tom Brady early in his career either.  Plus, The MMQB's Albert Breer joins Colin from Atlanta to discuss the potential of this being a high scoring Super Bowl and why this Patriots team is more like their 2001 team as opposed to the 2017 team.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
